item.title: Is Moses a mass murderer?
item.description: The story that we heard read today from the book of exodus is a controversial one, like many of the stories in the bible, its controversial for what it claims, controversial for what it awakens, controversial for what it assumes.
item.itunes:author: St David's of Canterbury
item.itunes:summary: The story that we heard read today from the book of exodus is a controversial one, like many of the stories in the bible, its controversial for what it claims, controversial for what it awakens, controversial for what it assumes.

item.title: Was Jesus an Alien?
item.description: Ascenion Day....a stolen idea from the Hindu tradition? A metaphor of hope? A literal rising up? What do you imagine?
item.itunes:author: St David's of Canterbury
item.itunes:summary: Ascenion Day....a stolen idea from the Hindu tradition? A metaphor of hope? A literal rising up? What do you imagine?
